e7b4018c-53cc-4772-bd23-fabdd6692f41.description: Earners of the Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning for physicians, advanced practice providers, clinical staff, and non-clinical staff focuses on building rapport, creating patient confidence, listening well, conveying compassion, and finishing strong. The certification will demonstrate clear qualifications and commitment to advancing their knowledge in improving the patient experience.
e7b4018c-53cc-4772-bd23-fabdd6692f41.name: Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 26 micro-coaching sessions. During the program, the participant will learn and apply new skills to improve the patient experience.

71b2d351-f35c-4555-8a8f-680fb9cd3534.description: Earners of the Leading the Patient Experience Certification hone their skills in leading to deliver a high-quality patient experience in their care settings. The program delivers an approach to mobilizing teams, inspiring change, transforming teams, and driving results by focusing on four parts: create a cause, communicate the future, track success, and build skills. This certification demonstrates abilities to lead teams effectively as they focus on creating an exceptional patient experience.
71b2d351-f35c-4555-8a8f-680fb9cd3534.name: Leading the Patient Experience Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 28 micro-coaching sessions.

0a906982-e6ec-4a44-98be-4028382e9e89.description: Earners of the Foundations of Nursing Leadership Certification learn and apply evidence-derived leadership skills. This role-specific learning for nurse leaders, emerging nurse leaders, and new nurse leaders focuses on these skills: demonstrate heart, elevate my team, and inspire success. This program focuses on leading change and leading effective teams. Leaders will be challenged in advancing their leadership skills and abilities to lead others to be their best.
0a906982-e6ec-4a44-98be-4028382e9e89.name: Foundations of Nursing Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 36 micro-coaching sessions.

8be60f54-e622-43d2-9415-4be1088d6a60.description: Earners of the Advanced Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning designed for physicians, advanced practice providers, clinical staff, and non-clinical staff builds upon the foundational skills learned in the Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification, delivering tips on six skills: explaining care, engaging patients, time perception, respecting patients, connecting with patients, and care as a team.
8be60f54-e622-43d2-9415-4be1088d6a60.name: Advanced Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 26 micro-coaching sessions. During the program, the participant will learn and apply new skills to improve the patient experience.

7580abff-1807-48df-bc9c-f449993bec98.description: Earners of the Hospital Medicine Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning is for hospital medicine physicians and advanced practice providers practicing in a hospital setting. The certification focuses on six skills: hospitalist first impressions, conveying respect, bringing compassion, listening well, explaining care, and sending home. Earners demonstrate their advanced knowledge in improving the patient experience.
7580abff-1807-48df-bc9c-f449993bec98.name: Hospital Medicine Patient Experience Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 26 micro-coaching sessions. During the program, the participant will learn and apply new skills to improve the patient experience.

7be2f84f-fe7f-4eff-a0dd-4a47a6635934.description: Earners of the Corporate Experience Certification learn and apply a body of knowledge to enhance the experience they deliver. The program focuses on essential leadership, teamwork, and character-building qualities such as self-awareness, building team trust, team communication and recognition, listening well, and conveying compassion. This program develops skills to better collaborate, communicate and provide care in our healthcare settings.
7be2f84f-fe7f-4eff-a0dd-4a47a6635934.name: Corporate Experience Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 26 micro-coaching sessions.

faf130ca-9413-43ca-97f5-2c8683b28d4e.description: Earners of the Hospital Staff Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. The certification focuses on six skills: hospitalist first impressions, conveying respect, bringing compassion, listening well, explaining care, and sending home. d605fcd3-7b34-4ae4-90c2-805ce84a8d37.description: Earners of the Advanced Hospital Medicine Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This learning designed for physicians, advanced practice providers, clinical staff, and non-clinical staff builds upon foundational skills learned in the Hospital Medicine Patient Experience Certification, with tips on six skills: Being There, Supporting Family, Efficient Rounding, Hospitalist Connection, Clinical Shift Transitions, and Partnering with the Nurse.

e1b54e76-7a90-4696-935a-bd8bab86e85f.description: Earners of the Emergency Medicine Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning is for physicians and advanced practice providers practicing in an emergency medicine setting. The certification focuses on four skills: communicating at the bedside, practicing self-care, supporting your team, and knowing your flow. Earners demonstrate their advanced knowledge in improving the patient experience.

e56fbeb8-8701-40c1-9725-01eb775070e7.description: Graduates of the Clinician Coach Certification Program have successfully completed an intensive 6-month training program. These certified coaches have developed communication, analytical, and relational skills that will make them effective patient experience coaches at their organization. Graduates have learned components of formalizing a patient experience coaching system while also learning and training how to prepare for, deliver, and provide feedback for a coaching session with a clinician.
e56fbeb8-8701-40c1-9725-01eb775070e7.name: Practicing Excellence Clinician Coach Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in various learning modalities consisting of presentations on theory, skill-building exercises, peer group learning, coaching practice and simulation sessions, case studies, and planning sessions.
Completion of the Practicing Excellence Clinician Coach Certification micro-learning development program.
Completion of the required hours for coaching provided and coaching received from a certified professional coach.

87aceb36-9610-48d6-b837-fecfc45939d0.description: Earners of the Inpatient Care Team Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. 99f6f272-2a95-4f95-9e1b-2e656e4b0ea4.description: Earners of the Foundations of Leadership Certification learn and apply evidence-derived leadership skills. This role-specific learning for leaders focuses on these skills: Mindset, Self-Awareness, Power of Why, Expressing Gratitude, Improving Team Communication, Empathy in Teams, and Trusted Leadership. 610af272-1eb5-4658-808a-62f75a3fbc73.description: Earners of the Distinguished Ambulatory Patient Experience Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning designed for physicians, advanced practice providers, clinical staff, and non-clinical staff builds upon Ambulatory Patient Experience and Advanced Ambulatory Patient Experience Certifications. This program delivers tips on new skills for an impactful patient experience: empathy, managing difficult encounters, and managing expectations.

This role-specific learning for leaders focuses on these skills: Mindset, Modeling, Appreciation, Teaching, and Listening. a09488b4-3ba6-4883-ad89-ee9f5e3f09d4.name: Building Transformative Leaders Certification

e96f1c14-517c-4275-888d-c0fe9a94a152.description: Earners of the Nursing Onboarding Coaching Certification learn and apply evidence-derived leadership skills to accelerate critical skill development and confidence. This role-specific learning supports those involved in onboarding, orienting, engaging, and supporting new nurses. The certification focuses on five skills: creating the onboarding experience, creating a positive learning environment, precepting for clinical competence, creating a successful practice, and joy in onboarding.
e96f1c14-517c-4275-888d-c0fe9a94a152.name: Nursing Onboarding Coaching Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 26 micro-coaching sessions.

133aaf0e-9fe2-4601-9910-51fb439b59c8.description: Earners of the Transition to Practice Certification learn and apply evidence-derived skills to accelerate critical skill development and confidence. This role-specific learning for new nurses in their first year of practice focuses on these six onboarding and orientation skills: patient-focused care, team collaboration, time management, quality and safety, life-work balance, and professional role socialization.
133aaf0e-9fe2-4601-9910-51fb439b59c8.name: Nursing Transition to Practice Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete 28 micro-coaching sessions.

136f9d3a-3408-472b-9e2d-99ed84812631.description: Earners of the Telehealth Certification learn and apply evidence-derived patient connection skills. This role-specific learning is for clinicians on the front line of virtual care delivery to master patient connection skills for video visits. The certification focuses on five skills: rapport, respect, caring, participation, and managing Covid-19 circumstances. The certification will demonstrate clear qualifications and commitment to advancing their knowledge in improving the patient experience.
136f9d3a-3408-472b-9e2d-99ed84812631.name: Telehealth Certification
